description: Getting Over It is a frustrating psychological horror game about climbing a mountain.

0.1.0.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Gameplay
- Items: `Gravity Reduction`, `Goal Height Reduction`, `Wind Trap`
- Locations:
  - 24 spots on the map, up to 12 randomly chosen for every world
  - Reaching the top of the mountain (up to 9)
- Goal: Reaching the top up to 10 times
- Difficulties `easy`, `medium`, `hard` (affecting logic)
## Client mod
### Gameplay
Everything already mentioned in the APWorld section
### QoL
- Formatted connection info string in config for easier switching between servers
## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds and save files?
Initial release, this has never existed before
0.1.0.title: v0.1.0 (initial release)

0.2.0.description:
# Changelog
## APWorld
### Gameplay
- Added 9 new locations
- Added 2 goal height reductions
### Bug fixes
- Fixed inconsistencies with `Got Over It #X` logic
## Client mod
### Gameplay
- Added 9 new locations
- Added 2 new goal height reductions
### Bug fixes
- Fixed client always crashing if Jor02's level mod is not installed (oops)
### QoL
- Reformatted `ConnectionList` to JSON format
- Added `OfflineItems` and `PrintHammerCollision` config
## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
Completely backwards compatible, but the mod's config file must be heavily edited or deleted upon updating
0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

0.2.1.description:
# Changelog
The installation instructions have slightly changed, they can be found at https://github.com/BlastSlimey/Archipelago/blob/getting_over_it/worlds/getting_over_it/docs/setup_en.md

## APWorld
### QoL
- Added Universal Tracker support
### Technicalities
- Added docs and game info
- Finished `WebWorld` class
- Moved items and locations to their own file

## Client mod
### Bug fixes
- Fixed wind trap not working as intended (and sometimes having no effect at all)
- Fixed mod not loading on linux and macOS
### QoL
- Added server messages to console output
### Technicalities
- Added `PrintGravity` debug option
- Improved `PrintHammerCollision` console output visually
- Disabled continuing saves to prevent cheating

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
Completely backwards compatible, but the mod's config file must be deleted before updating if tried to play 0.1.0
0.2.1.title: v0.2.1 (actually windy update)

0.2.2.description:
# Changelog

## APWorld
No changes, same file as 0.2.1

## Client mod
### Bug fixes
- Fixed one error throwing item leading to item receiving being interrupted
- Fixed items not being properly received when reconnecting to a multiworld with some already collected items
### QoL
- Added automatic save files for each multiworld and slot
  - This also removes the need to disable the continue button
### Technicalities
- Added more debug output
- Reworked most reflection for private variables to using HarmonyX's reference parameters

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
Completely backwards compatible, but the mod's config file must be deleted before updating if tried to play 0.1.0
0.2.2.title: v0.2.2 (save files update)

0.2.3.description:
# Changelog

## APWorld
No changes, same file as 0.2.1

## Client mod
### Bug fixes
- Updated to Archipelago.Multiclient.Net 0.6.6, thereby making the client compatible with AP 0.6.2 rooms

## Is this versions mod compatible with older apworlds?
Completely backwards compatible, but the mod's config file must be deleted before updating if tried to play 0.1.0
0.2.3.title: v0.2.3 (AP 0.6.2 compatibility update)
